original_title: Manhattan: Grand Street - Pitt Street: Exterior views of the Neighborhood Theatre.
text:
(1) Grand Street, north side, east from but not including Pitt, to and including Columbia Streets. On the extreme left, is the Neighborhood Theatre, 466-470 Grand Street, adjoining the N.E. corner of Pitt Street.
April 1, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

(2) The same, a closer view of Grand Street, at, adjoining and east of the N.E. corner of Pitt Street.
October 28, 1927.
P. L. Sperr.

(3) The same, as No. 2, showing mainly the Neighborhood Theatre.
October 12, 1931.
P. L. Sperr.

Pitt Sreet, at, adjoining and north of the N.E. corner of Grand Street.

April 1, 1928

P. L. Sperr.

(1)
At the intersection of Grand, Division, Gouverneur and Pitt Streets, showing Grand Street, north side, west from and including Pitt Street; Division Street, north side, west from Gouverneur; also, Gouverneur Street, west side, from Grand to Division Streets. St. Mary's Roman Catholic Church appears at the corner of Grand and Ridge Streets.

July 1, 1930.

P. L. Sperr.

(2)
The same, showing a close-up of the intersection.

July 22, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

(3)
The same, showing only Grand Street.

July 22, 1936.

P. L. Sperr.

title: Magen Bros. Loans: 459 Grand St.-Pitt St., Manhattan
Magen Bros. Loans: Gouverneur St.-Division St., Manhattan

text:
458-460 Grand Street, adjoining the N.W. corner of Pitt Street, showing the store-front of a 7-story building.

March 26, 1937.

P. L. Sperr.
